metadata.title: Target applications of RX261 and RX260

sections.content:
Question:
What kinds of applications are these MCUs suitable for?
Answer:
They are suitable for a wide range of applications, including home appliances that require 5V operation and touch functionality, industrial equipment and building automation equipment that require high-speed processing and highly reliable communication such as CAN FD, and battery-powered products that require long operating times with low power consumption.
Suitable Products
RX261, RX260
